title: Written In The Stars
lyrics:
[Intro: WENDY]
Oh, woah, woah, woah
Oh, woah, wo-oh-oh
Oh, woah, woah, woah
Oh, woah, wo-oh-oh
[Verse 1: WENDY]
Seems like we've been here before
Your eyes are seeing straight right through my core
It's kinda strange but I like it
Ain't no reason tryna fight it, yeah
[Verse 2: WENDY]
Might be déjà vu
First time we met, but I remembered you
We were creepin' in the night time
Maybe in another lifetime
[Pre-Chorus: John Legend & WENDY]
Don't tell me you don't feel what I feel right now
Woo, it's written all over you
Don't tell me you don’t feel what I feel somehow
Ooh, I keep findin' my way back to you
[Chorus: John Legend & WENDY]
You can go anywhere, babe, wherever you want
Because I know we're written in the stars
You can go any which way, don't matter how far
Because I know we're written in the stars

[Post-Chorus: John Legend & WENDY, 
WENDY
, 
John Legend
]
Da-da, da-da-da, da, da-da
Da-da, da-da-da, da, da
No question that we're written in the stars
Ooh
Ooh, yeah
[Verse 3: John Legend, 
John Legend & WENDY
]
The moment you looked at me
I started losing feeling in my cheeks
Felt myself moving towards ya
I just wanted to get closer, oh
When you say, "Hello"
I know there's no limit where we'll go
I want you to be ready
I'll hold your heart if you'll let me, oh
[Pre-Chorus: John Legend & WENDY, 
WENDY
]
Don't tell me you don't feel what I feel right now
Woo, it's written all over you
Don't tell me you don’t feel what I feel somehow
Ooh, I keep findin' my way back to you (
Oh
)
[Chorus: John Legend & WENDY, 
WENDY
]
You can go anywhere, babe, wherever you want (
Oh, I want
)
Because I know we're written in the stars
You can go any which way, don't matter how far (
Don't matter how far
)
Because I know we're written in the stars (
Oh, ayy
)

[Post-Chorus: John Legend & WENDY, 
John Legend
]
Da-da, da-da-da, da, da-da (
Da-da-da
)
Da-da, da-da-da, da, da (
Oh
)
No question that we're written in the stars
[Bridge: WENDY, 
John Legend
, 
John Legend & WENDY
]
And I promise every day (
I promise every day
)
To make you feel this way (
To make me feel this way
)
So that you know it's 
written in the stars
[Outro: WENDY, 
John Legend
, 
John Legend & WENDY
]
Oh, woah, woah, woah (Da-da-da, da, da-da; 
oh
)
Oh, woah, wo-oh-oh (La-ra-da, da, da-da, 
la-ra-da-da-da
)
Oh, woah, woah, woah (Nowhere)
Oh, woah, wo-oh-oh (
Written in the stars
)
Oh, woah, woah, woah (
Oh
)
Oh, woah, wo-oh-oh (
Woo, woo
)
Oh, woah, woah, woah
Oh, woah, wo-oh-oh (
Oh, we're written in the stars
)
